title: #60: Floor Soup!
itunes:title: #60: Floor Soup!
description:
Attention Riddle High Students! This episode contains chair talk, snakes on a plane, founding father 'raps', even MORE J.P. Riddles and the introduction of our favorite new segment: Erin's Animal Corner! Grab a stool, face your bed and watch your spouse listen to this weeks Hey Riddle Riddle! #WiddleWednesday #chairtobestupid

Starring:

Adal Rifai

John Patrick Coan

Erin Keif

Editing by: 

KJ Snyder

Theme by: 

Arne Parrott

Logo by: 

Emily Kardamis & Emmaline Morris

Want more? Get Weekly Bonus Eps on Patreon!

Want merch? Visit our TeePublic Store!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
